name: Paper (MCR Alpine, Autoupdating)
author: ddd@jcx.ovh
description: High performance Spigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies.

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft (e.g. "1.16.1") to download. 

Leave blank to always get the latest version.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the paper release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version.
